name: Platformer Hell
description:
Platformer Hell combines the movement of a platformer with the hectic gameplay of a bullet hell. Kill the various creatures to get your score higher.

Put your High score in the comments if you want

Controls: 

Jump: W or Up Arrow

Move Left/Right: A, D, or Left Arrow, Right Arrow

Shoot: Left Mouse Button, or Space

Made for the Score Space Jam #12 in 72 hours.
